replies.msg: How do you spike hair in the front? For me I usually tell my hairdresser to shave my hair at the sides and gel it on top. At home I use clay and move my fingers towards the back of my hair while setting them erect at the same time. As I do so, I clench my fingers around my hair for it to settle, lifting my strands up. I also use a spray to hold it up afterwards.

How do you spike hair in the front? For me I usually tell my hairdresser to shave my hair at the sides and gel it on top. At home I use clay and move my fingers towards the back of my hair while setting them erect at the same time. As I do so, I clench my fingers around my hair for it to settle, lifting my strands up. I also use a spray to hold it up afterwards.
